oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of beetroot-Vinasse on ascospore formation of Venturia pirina in a one-year field trial on an organic conference orchard (presentation)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Timmermans, B.G.H.
Jansonius, PieterJans
Bruinenberg, Riekje
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop combinations and interactions
Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In a one year experiment in an organic Conference orchard, a single treatment with 500 l/ha beetroot Vinasse was tested as a means to reduce the formation of ascospores by Venturia pirina on the leaf litter.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Timmermans, B.G.H.; Jansonius, PieterJans and Bruinenberg, Riekje (2012) Effects of beetroot-Vinasse on ascospore formation of Venturia pirina in a one-year field trial on an organic conference orchard (presentation). Louis Bolk Instituut , Driebergen. [Completed]
